attributes.action: Regulate benefits immigrants are entitled to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Immigrants are important in our society & work hard. However, I am angry that they get more benefits than most British people. My mum moved to Greece & had to find 2 sponsors, arrange health insurance & sign saying that she will be self sufficient & not claim any benefits before she was able to stay. Why can other countries do this but we cant?
I'm 25 & disabled, struggling to make ends meet like most British people, I am regulary reasessed for my Incapacity & DLA Benefit. I can not get help with anything else such as prescriptions, Council Tax etc. It makes me mad that people who have contributed to the national purse are penalised & people that come here with their hands out get benefits straight away. 
I know they pay tax etc, but there must be a good reason why they choose to come here instead of France, Germany etc. The only reason I can think of is our benefits & NHS.
The Government should delay giving benefits to immigrants until they have worked & paid tax for a while. Show them that we will accept them & that our benefits are a reward for hard work & should not be taken for granted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
